lang.command.reward_claim: <green>[BattlePass]</green> You claimed the reward for level <yellow>%d</yellow>!
lang.command.premium_unlocked: <green>[BattlePass]</green> You unlocked the Premium Battle Pass!
lang.command.already_claimed_level: <red>[BattlePass]</red> You already claimed the reward for level <yellow>%d</yellow>!
lang.command.not_premium: <red>[BattlePass]</red> This is a premium reward! Use <yellow>/battlepass premium</yellow> to unlock.
lang.command.no_premium_access: You do not have premium access.
lang.command.must_be_player: <red>[BattlePass]</red> This command must be run by a player!
lang.season.already_active: <red>[BattlePass]</red> A battle pass season is already active! (Season %d)
lang.season.no_active: <red>[BattlePass]</red> No battle pass season is currently active!
lang.gui.info.title: <aqua>Battle Pass Info</aqua>
lang.season.reset.confirm.title: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Confirm Season Reset
lang.season.reset.confirm.message: <gray>Are you sure you want to end the current season? This will reset all player progress.</gray>
lang.season.reset.confirm.impact: <gray>This will affect <yellow>{playerCount}</yellow> players and reset <yellow>{totalProgress}</yellow> total progress.</gray>
lang.season.reset.confirm.backup: <gray>A backup will be created before the reset operation.</gray>
lang.season.reset.confirm.proceed: <green>Type 'CONFIRM' to proceed with the season reset.</green>
lang.season.reset.complete.title: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Season Reset Complete!
lang.season.reset.complete.summary: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Season reset complete! {playerCount} players reset, {premiumCount} premium status preserved.
lang.season.reset.complete.details: <gray>Reset Summary: {totalPlayers} players, {premiumPreserved} premium preserved, {backupFiles} backup files created.</gray>
lang.season.reset.complete.new_season: <gray>New season {newSeasonId} is now ready to start.</gray>
lang.season.reset.complete.personal: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Season reset complete, {playerName}! Welcome to Season {newSeason}.
lang.season.end.broadcast: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Season {seasonNumber} has ended! Thank you for participating.
lang.season.end.broadcast.detailed: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Season {seasonNumber} has ended after {duration} days! Final stats: {totalPlayers} participants, {maxLevelReached} max level reached.
lang.season.start.broadcast: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Season {seasonNumber} has begun! Duration: {duration}, Max Level: {maxLevel}
lang.season.start.broadcast.detailed: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Welcome to Season {seasonNumber}! Duration: {duration} days, Max Level: {maxLevel}, Premium rewards available!
lang.season.end.personal: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Hello {playerName}, Season {seasonNumber} has ended! Your final level: {finalLevel}
lang.season.start.personal: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Welcome to Season {seasonNumber}, {playerName}! Good luck reaching level {maxLevel}!
lang.season.transition.countdown: <yellow>[BattlePass]</yellow> Season {seasonNumber} ends in {timeRemaining}! Make sure to claim your rewards.
lang.season.transition.maintenance: <gray>[BattlePass]</gray> Season transition in progress. Battle Pass temporarily unavailable.
lang.season.premium.preserved: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Your premium status has been preserved for the new season!
lang.season.premium.restored: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Your premium access has been restored from permissions.
lang.season.premium.restored.detailed: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Welcome back, {playerName}! Your premium access has been restored for Season {seasonNumber}.
lang.season.premium.sync.complete: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Premium status synced for {syncedCount} players from permissions.
lang.season.premium.lost: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Your premium status was not preserved for the new season.
lang.season.premium.migration.success: <green>[BattlePass]</green> {playerCount} premium players successfully migrated to new season.
lang.season.premium.migration.partial: <yellow>[BattlePass]</yellow> {successCount} of {totalCount} premium players migrated successfully. {failedCount} failed.
lang.season.reset.error.no_permission: <red>[BattlePass]</red> You don't have permission to reset seasons.
lang.season.reset.error.already_in_progr: <red>[BattlePass]</red> A season reset is already in progress.
lang.season.reset.error.backup_failed: <red>[BattlePass]</red> Failed to create player data backup. Reset cancelled.
lang.season.reset.error.rollback_initiat: <yellow>[BattlePass]</yellow> Reset failed. Initiating rollback to previous state...
lang.season.reset.error.rollback_complet: <green>[BattlePass]</green> Rollback complete. Player data restored to pre-reset state.
lang.season.reset.error.rollback_failed: <red>[BattlePass]</red> CRITICAL: Rollback failed! Manual intervention required. Backup location: {backupPath}
lang.season.validation.passed: <green>[BattlePass]</green> All validation checks passed. Ready to proceed.
lang.gui.progress.name: <bold>Your Progress</bold>
lang.gui.xp_info.name: <bold>XP Sources</bold>
lang.gui.premium.name: <gold>Premium Pass</gold>
lang.gui.title: Battle Pass
